mxGraphModel.root:
<mxCell id="enum_EnrollmentStatus" value="EnrollmentStatus
PENDING
IN_PROGRESS
COMPLETED" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFF2CC;strokeColor=#D6B656;" vertex="1" parent="1">
<mxCell id="class_Person" value="Person
- nif : String
- firstName : String
- lastName : String
- birthDate : LocalDate

+ getNif() : String
+ getFirstName() : String
+ getLastName() : String
+ getBirthDate() : LocalDate
+ toString() : String" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E1D5E7;strokeColor=#9673A6;" vertex="1" parent="1">

- department : String

+ getDepartment() : String
+ setDepartment(department: String) : void" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D5E8D4;strokeColor=#82B366;" vertex="1" parent="1">
<mxCell id="class_Student" value="Student
- group : Group
- enrollments : List<Enrollment>

+ getGroup() : Group
+ setGroup(group: Group) : void
+ getEnrollments() : List<Enrollment>
+ addEnrollment(e: Enrollment) : void" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFE6CC;strokeColor=#D79B00;" vertex="1" parent="1">
